Reply: How Large MNC can control anything when existing Mandi system will be available. It will only give more options and freedom to farmers to sell their goods to anyone without a middleman.
@Monal Patel mandi system will be out of business soon as centre wants to remove it.

@Cry Vell That's called being presumptuous. PM specifically said that mandi system will be available as always. They are providing freedom for farmers to sell anywhere. Do you know it require Dsitrict megistrate's  permission to sell matar outside your state. Mills cant purchase the crop directly from farmer. This mandi system monopoly has cost farmer's no profit. Just some middleman go profited from farmer's hard work. This bill is just giving them alternatives to sell THEIR goods without restrictions and with complete freedom. They can choose mandi with the MSP available there or they can get a struck a deal directly with mills or any other trader for that matter.

@Monal Patel lets wait and see bro. Based on Modis past promises i cant bee too positive. He never stood by his promises. Sorry if i hurt anybodys feelings on this,  if he was so sure about it he could have engaged farmer bodies in the discussions. Instead he choose trade bodies.
